title: Season 2
body:
We should halt the game at block 19179304 friday 15 oct, to take some time and rebalance the game.

A couple of things will be done:

1. We will rebalance level, production, buildingprice and upgrades
2. We will burn some lower level rugs.
3. Add some minor features
4. Squash some bugs.
author: 0x49DB82FF7B06976F2ab6B69C5d23A6c7ee0BcEa3
